 2008-14962008-08-26HERITAGE,  ,  ,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of ARNI C. THORSTEINSON of Winnipeg, Manitoba, as Chairperson of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum for Human Rights to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years.
